Must candidate potentially curative therapy standardofcare approve therapy Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 2 . Any unresolved toxicity ≥ Grade 2 previous anticancer therapy except stable chronic toxicity ( ≤ Grade 2 ) expect resolve . Laboratory medical history parameter outside Protocoldefined range .
